short_summary: The Procurement of Packsst Systems Hardware, Maintenance and Support
description: Amended Request for Quotations for PacksStar System bm Hardware Maintenance and Support for the Department of National Defence
full_summary:
**PacStar Systems Hardware, Maintenance, and Support for the Department of National Defence**
========================

**Tender Details**
---------------

|  Detail    |          Value|          Value
|  -------  |          --- |          --- 
|  Number    | SSC-24-00025368:T |
|  Solicitation Number    | BPM020701/25368   |
|  Amendment Number    | 1                  |
|  Publication Date    | 2024-02-15          |
|  Tender Closing Date    | 2024-02-28T14:00:00| 
|  Amendment Date    | 2024-02-23          |
|  Expected Contract Start Date    | None               |
|  Expected Contract End Date    | None               |

**Details**
------------

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) invites qualified suppliers to respond to the solicitation for PacStar Systems Hardware, Maintenance, and Support for the Department of National Defence (DND). This procurement aims to provide DND with hardware, maintenance, and support services for their PacStar systems.

**Request for Quote**
-------------------

SSC has released the Request for Quotations (RFQ) document, which outlines the mandatory requirements, evaluation criteria, and basis of selection for the proposed contract.

**Important Notes to Suppliers**
-----------------------------

- Bidders must submit their proposals electronically via email.
- Faxed and hard-copy bids will not be accepted, except for exceptional circumstances.
- The bid submission deadline has been changed to February 28, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. EST.
- All changes have been bolded and underlined in the updated RFQ document for ease of reference.

**Delivery and Sourcing**
----------------------

- The contract will be delivered to the DND in Kingston, Ontario.
- SSC is seeking suppliers who can provide the required hardware, maintenance, and support services.

**Document Attachment**
---------------------

Access to the RFQ document and tender files is available at: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/28854F92-299E-4E3C-BBDD-2E321E73BB5F][src] or [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/60DBA5C9-B793-4220-BAC7-71BCE6111749][src]
